paleval 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Continuous-palette functions

Each of these functions returns a continuous-palette function.

pev_fcont()

Coerce to continuous-palette function

pev_fcont_rescale()

Rescale input to continuous-palette function

pev_fcont_diverging()

Create continuous-palette function from HCL parameters

pev_fcont_cvd() pev_fdisc_cvd()

Modify output to simulate color-vision deficiency

pev_fcont_reverse() pev_fdisc_reverse()

Reverse palette-function

Discrete-palette functions

Each of these functions returns a discrete-palette function.

pev_fdisc()

Coerce to discrete-palette function

pev_fcont_cvd() pev_fdisc_cvd()

Modify output to simulate color-vision deficiency

pev_fcont_reverse() pev_fdisc_reverse()

Reverse palette-function

Perceptual separation

Consider the perceptual-separation within a discrete-palette.

pev_data_separation()

Get perceptual-separation within discrete-palette

pev_gg_separation()

ggplot for perceptual-distance within discrete-palette

Perceptual derivative

Consider the perceptual-derivative for a continuous-palette.

pev_data_derivative()

Get perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

pev_gg_derivative()

ggplot for perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

Perceptual distance

Consider the perceptual-distance for a continuous-palette.

pev_data_distance()

Get perceptual-distance of continuous-palette from reference color

pev_gg_distance()

ggplot for perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

HCL space

Consider a palette in HCL space.

pev_data_derivative()

Get perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

pev_data_distance()

Get perceptual-distance of continuous-palette from reference color

pev_data_hcl()

Get HCL data on series of hex-colors

pev_data_hcl_ref()

Get minimum perceptual-distance from reference color

pev_data_separation()

Get perceptual-separation within discrete-palette

pev_fcont()

Coerce to continuous-palette function

pev_fcont_cvd() pev_fdisc_cvd()

Modify output to simulate color-vision deficiency

pev_fcont_diverging()

Create continuous-palette function from HCL parameters

pev_fcont_rescale()

Rescale input to continuous-palette function

pev_fcont_reverse() pev_fdisc_reverse()

Reverse palette-function

pev_fdisc()

Coerce to discrete-palette function

pev_gg_derivative()

ggplot for perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

pev_gg_distance()

ggplot for perceptual-derivative of continuous-palette

pev_gg_hcl_bloom() pev_gg_hcl_bloom_target() pev_gg_hcl_bloom_lum()

ggplot for HCL data on series of hex-colors

pev_gg_hcl_plane()

ggplot for HCL data on series of hex-colors

pev_gg_hcl_spectrum()

ggplot for HCL data on series of hex-colors

pev_gg_separation()

ggplot for perceptual-distance within discrete-palette

pev_hcl()

Create HCL parameter-set

pev_hex_derivative()

Calculate perceptual-derivative for sequence of hex-colors

pev_hex_distance()

Calculate perceptual-distance between two (sets of) colors

pev_map_hcl()

Create list of HCL parameter-sets

Hex-colors

pev_hex_distance()

Calculate perceptual-distance between two (sets of) colors

pev_hex_derivative()

Calculate perceptual-derivative for sequence of hex-colors

HCL parameters

pev_hcl()

Create HCL parameter-set

pev_map_hcl()

Create list of HCL parameter-sets
